required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Sinotecean on Tolerance and Pharmacokinetics
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I Study of Sinotecean on Tolerance and Pharmacokinetics

brief_summary.textblock: This study is conducted to assess the maximum tolerated dose (MTD) and dose-limiting toxicity (DLT), to evaluate the pharmacokinetics, safety and preliminary anti-tumor activity of Sinotecean.

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic Assessments for Area Under Curve（AUC）
primary_outcome.description: To collect point with single drug:5 min/10 min/15 min/30 min/1 h/2h/4h/6 h/8h/10h/12 h/24 h/32h/48 h

secondary_outcome.time_frame: each 42 days up to intolerance the toxicity or progression of disease（PD） (up to 24 months)
